content: the hat after blocking colors and is then repeated seven more times in each b and d were used to make the pom pom in the round eight repeats total sample shown note carry the floats every 5-6 stitches as always if you have any questions or comments when knitting the panda colorwork section please contact me either on ravelry iknit2purl2 or via email at iknit2purl2@gmail com © iknit2purl2 2016 iknit2purl2 com 3 color a color b color c color d © iknit2purl2 2016 iknit2purl2 com 4
